item.title: Is Sam Altman Crazy or a Genius? $50 Billion AGI Gamble Explained!

item.description: In a series of candid discussions, Sam Altman, the CEO of OpenAI, has made bold statements about the future and financial commitment of his company towards achieving Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). item.title: Understanding Fuzzy C Means Clustering
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning algorithm that groups together similar data points based on criteria like shared attributes. Each cluster has data points that are similar to the other data points in the cluster while as a whole, the cluster is dissimilar to other data points. By making use of clustering algorithms, we […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning algorithm that groups together similar data points based on criteria like shared attributes. Each cluster has data points that are similar to the other data points in the cluster while as a whole, the cluster is dissimilar to other data points. By making use of clustering algorithms, we […]

item.title: OpenAI Sora: World’s First Commissioned Music Video by AI

item.description: OpenAI Sora is again in the limelight with its first commissioned Music Video. item.title: Gecko by Google: Pioneering the Next Generation of Text Embedding Models
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the world of text embeddings where text is converted into numbers! This world has recently been turned around by the distillation of large language models (LLMs) into efficient and compact forms. Google’s latest innovation, Gecko, is the lastest advancement in this technology, revolutionizing the way we handle textual data. This article explores […]
item.content:encoded:
